query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		policysetting {
			_id,
			has_policy,
			has_structured_policy,
			i_can_subscribe_to_policy_changes,
			i_can_view_policy_versions,
			id,
			last_policy_change_at,
			policy,
			structured_policy {
				brand_promise,
				id,
				preferences,
				process,
				safe_harbor,
				scope,
				url,
			},
			subscribed,
		}
	}
